mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT sav.sa_date, so.items, sav.savings, sav.order_num FROM shop_order so, savings sav WHERE so.order_num = sav.order_num AND so.order_num <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE order_num IN ( SELECT order_num FROM shop_order WHERE user_key = 1 ) AND order_num > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} ORDER BY order_num desc
